discover.description: a.k.a the forum (https://forum.sparc-camp.org/) and associated cross-posting channels in the Discord.

chill.description: where you can hang out to, you know, chill. play games, join casual conversations, meet staff, do your own work while hanging out in a lounge.

learn.description: where any sort of (mostly) structured class or activity will begin. This zone is still under constructionâ€”look out for its launch in a few days!

create.description: find co-creators through Personal Rooms, or start things rolling in https://forum.sparc-camp.org/. this zone is an open sandbox, have fun with it!

error_messages.no_DM: Hi! I don't like DMs. Let's talk in the server.
error_messages.role_not_found: Server doesn't have role "{}". Talk to an admin.
error_messages.need_role: Must have role "{}" to do that action.
